price: So woe to those who disbelieve from [the punishment of] the Day which they are promised.
arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
